features.name: Camouflage
features.description: You blend into your surroundings and become completely indistinguishable from the environment. Moving or making an attack ends this effect.

features.name: Acid Splash
features.description: Melee: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 4 acid damage.
